author: abcoathup
content:
Bellatrix is the consensus layer client upgrade.  

The Merge requires consensus layer clients to upgrade to Bellatrix (September 6), the execution layer clients to upgrade to Paris and then the transition to PoS happens when we hit TTD.

See: https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/08/12/finalized-no-36/
